title: Dreadnova Darius

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Dreadnova Darius with ingame gameplay! Purchase RP via Amazon (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Price: Loot Exclusive (10 Gemstones) Skin name is CONFIRMED as Dreadnova Darius, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle.

body: As a long time darius main I am REALLY excited for this skin, the particles look great, the recall is awesome, I just have one request. On his model it shows darius wearing a kind of mask over his mouth so I thought it would be cool to change his VO a bit so his voice sounds kind of distorted and radio-like. If this is indeed a gemstone skin, which is really hard to get, and is probably worth more then a legendary skin, then it shouldn't be too big of a deal to include something cool like this? Would make the skin 10 times better in my opinion, but regardless you've done a good job on it. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
